ygData.subject: Re: Telescope Lens Quest (Spoiler)
ygData.msgSnippet: Hehe, yeah, I finished the quest and sent the info to Allakhazaam.  Oh well, was worth a try. I think we need to take a look at Solusek.  There is a gnome city
ygData.messageBody:
Hehe, yeah, I finished the quest and sent the info to Allakhazaam. Oh
well, was worth a try.
I think we need to take a look at Solusek. There is a gnome city within.
